content: Listen to my story folks it won't take long and I'll try to make it short. Today a friend of mine for the past 43 years was invited to shoot our weapons on my Son's best friends 1800 acre property. I brought my 45 and 22 long riffle, Chip, my friend brought his two guns, Tony had three and my son has his old enfield. Once we started shooting Tony's cell phone started ringing and before you knew it about 5 or 6 more people showed up with AK's, M-16's, 9mm, 7mm, you name it they had it. I talked to a few of the guys after we stopped for a while and I was trying to have some fun with them as I do with you all here but soon I found out that if you start talking about Obama and the rest of the Motley crew they get as serious as two Rangers in a fox hole being over run by a battalion of VC. I sure don't want to be around when they try to take their guns away. These guys had tree stands in the woods so far back that you had to have an ATV and then you had to walk a mile to get there. One guy, I swear, had about 12 guns and enough ammo to start a war in DC. They all know each other, they have commo, food, generators, Heck one guy had a condo he build with AC and a TV in it out in the middle of a swamp. He invited me over in July to go snake hunting with him. Last year he said he killed 97 water moccasins and rattle snakes. Thats enough for now but to some they may be rednecks but to me they are good ole boys who just want to be left alone and are proud of their country and what they have.

content: I know groups of country folks in Kentucky and Tennessee, and they, too, have been stocking and stashing. Any indication by the obamanation that Holder is a-comin' for firearms, and they will take it mighty badly. They KNOW that the Second Amendment, free and unfettered, is the #1 bulwark against usurpation of citizens' rights. They will accept such behavior no more than patriots, which these well-informed and hard-working and law-abiding gun owners are, reacted to lobsterbacks coming to Concord and Lexington to take stored arms. There are 80 million gun owners and about 300 million guns in private hands. It would be smart and efficient for the authorities to devote their time and effort (and our money) into enforcing the laws on the books and respecting the firearm-owning citizens of America.

content: Far better to be/have a "redneck", than to have/be a "Yellow-Striper". If ya are confused, just ask any ol' redneck what having a "yellow stripe running down one's back" means! "Mr. and Mrs/Ms. MilqueToast" will probably happily show you theirs, if you don't let 'em know you are a red-blooded American or a "redneck". Being around such "yellow-stripers" will likely make your blood really boil, though. Be warned! They are far worse than pit viper 'snakes in the grass'! You can NEVER count on them, except to BETRAY YOUR TRUST, AND LET YOU DOWN EVERY TIME! KNOW the company you keep!

reply: Oh, my! Is that your idea of redneck humor, or are you the kind of redneck who thinks I've "got purdy teeth"? ...Alex
title: Rednecks in North Carolina are stocking up.

content: Listen to my story folks it won't take long and I'll try to make it short. Today a friend of mine for the past 43 years was invited to shoot our weapons on my Son's best friends 1800 acre property. I brought my 45 and 22 long riffle, Chip, my friend brought his two guns, Tony had three and my son has his old enfield. Once we started shooting Tony's cell phone started ringing and before you knew it about 5 or 6 more people showed up with AK's, M-16's, 9mm, 7mm, you name it they had it. I talked to a few of the guys after we stopped for a while and I was trying to have some fun with them as I do with you all here but soon I found out that if you start talking about Obama and the rest of the Motley crew they get as serious as two Rangers in a fox hole being over run by a battalion of VC. I sure don't want to be around when they try to take their guns away. These guys had tree stands in the woods so far back that you had to have an ATV and then you had to walk a mile to get there. One guy, I swear, had about 12 guns and enough ammo to start a war in DC. They all know each other, they have commo, food, generators, Heck one guy had a condo he build with AC and a TV in it out in the middle of a swamp. He invited me over in July to go snake hunting with him. Last year he said he killed 97 water moccasins and rattle snakes. Thats enough for now but to some they may be rednecks but to me they are good ole boys who just want to be left alone and are proud of their country and what they have.

content: quote: Originally posted by LuckySoFar: ---- Image reverse & up-side-down -- The attention to female style uniforms is a TRIBUTE to your lack of ( Y ) chromosones, or to your EXTRA ( triple XXX ) chroms! A sharp eye to fashion, Alexandra! Well done , Ma`am. Oh, my! Is that your idea of redneck humor, or are you the kind of redneck who thinks I've "got purdy teeth"? ...Alex
